name: The Tonightest Show Starring James Fallow ft. The Rooots
name_original: The Tonightest Show Starring James Fallow ft. The Rooots
description:
Versus game where one player plays a typing game as they try to read text from a teleprompter, and the other player plays a rhythm game. 

Controls: 

  • Typing Game - Keyboard 
  • Rhythm Game - Controller face buttons or keyboard arrow + triggers or left and right mouse buttons to send difficulty modifiers to the opposing player

Credits:

Gameplay Programming, UI, Sound Effects - Ian McDonald

3D Modeling, Tech Art, Programming - Christian MacNeill

Gameplay Programming - William Chia

Music - Gahwon Lee

Gameplay Programming - Thomas McDonald
